byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Aid to France: Amer Legion gives Xmas gifts to Alsatian refugee children
snippet: PARIS, Dec. 31--The American Legion caravan, bringing Christmas cheer to 400 Alsatian refugee children today, visited five villages in the Indre Department....

headline.main: U.S. Legion in France Carries Christmas To Alsace Refugee Children Exiled by War

lead_paragraph: PARIS, Dec. 31--The American Legion caravan, bringing Christmas cheer to 400 Alsatian refugee children today, visited five villages in the Indre Department.
